00001 #ifndef BI_CONSTRAINT_MGR_BASE_HPP
00002 #define BI_CONSTRAINT_MGR_BASE_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <Cell.hpp>
00005 #include <FMMoveInfo.hpp>
00006 
00015 class BiConstrMgrBase
00016 {
00017 public:
00019   int getMaxDiff() const 
00020   { 
00021     return _diff[0] > _diff[1] ? _diff[0] - _diff[1] : _diff[1] - _diff[0];
00022   }
00023 
00025   int getUpperBound() const { return _upperBound; }
00026 
00028   int getLowerBound() const { return _lowerBound; }
00029 
00031   void setUpperBound(int upperBound) { _upperBound = upperBound; }
00032 
00034   void setLowerBound(int lowerBound) { _lowerBound = lowerBound; }
00035 
00037   int* getDiff() { return _diff; }
00038 
00040   const int* getDiff() const { return _diff; }
00041 
00043   void setDiff(const int* diff) 
00044   { 
00045     setDiff2(diff);
00046     _knownSatisfiedAll = false;
00047   }
00048 
00050   void setDiff2(const int* diff) 
00051   { 
00052     _diff[0] = diff[0];
00053     _diff[1] = diff[1];
00054   }
00055 
00057   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo)
00058   {
00059     const unsigned int weight = moveInfo._cell->getWeight();
00060     _diff[moveInfo._toPart] += weight;
00061     _diff[moveInfo._fromPart] -= weight;
00062   }
00063 
00070   bool satisfiedAll(const int* diff)
00071   { 
00072     /* In the current implementation, once the partitions are
00073        legalized, they will remain legal for all later moves. */
00074     if (_knownSatisfiedAll) return true;
00075 
00076     for (unsigned int k=0; k<2; ++k) {
00077       if (diff[k] > _upperBound || diff[k] < _lowerBound) return false;
00078     }
00079 
00080     _knownSatisfiedAll = true;
00081     return true;
00082   }
00083 
00090   bool satisfiedOK()
00091   { 
00092     return satisfiedAll();
00093   }
00094 
00101   bool satisfiedAll() { return satisfiedAll(_diff); }
00102 
00103   void resetKnownSatisfiedAll() { _knownSatisfiedAll = false; }
00104 
00105 protected:
00107   BiConstrMgrBase() : _lowerBound(0), _knownSatisfiedAll(false) {}  
00108 
00110   ~BiConstrMgrBase() {}
00111 
00112 protected:
00113   int _diff[2];            
00114   int _upperBound;         
00115   int _lowerBound;         
00116   bool _knownSatisfiedAll; 
00117 };
00118 
00121 #endif
